expect.label: Headers

universal.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

callrail.parametersJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "apiKey",
		"type": "password",

	},
	{

		"type": "integer",
		"label": "Account ID",
		"required": true,

	}
]
